effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of your Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath by 3%, stacking up to 10 times. Ferocious Bite, Rip, and Primal Wrath have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!. Free Ferocious Bites are exempt from this chance.

Set: When you consume Apex Predator's Craving, become a Big Winner, dealing 1.1 million Physical damage to Apex Predator's primary target and increasing the damage of your periodic effects by 16% for 6 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cataclysmic Gladiator's Dragonhide Spaulders

name: Irradiated Undercoat

spells.description: Equip: Chance on hit to draw Unstable Isotopes from any Irradiated Elemental or Contaminated Glob.

Use: Absorb 100 Unstable Isotopes, increasing threat generation by 20%, Nature damage taken by 5%, and periodically heals the caster for 1% to 5% per 6 sec for 30 min.

Only usable on Mechagon Island. (1 Day Cooldown)

description: The metal links have a slight green glow to them. Wearing it cannot possibly be good for you.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Sever your bond at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,477 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Staff of the Verdant Circle

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
